oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jewish Cemetery, Nashville, Tenn., circa 1900s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A postcard of the Jewish Cemetery gate at 18th and Clay Streets, Nashville, Tennessee. The archway above the gate has the words "Temple Cemetery" chiseled in stone. Forms part of the Nashville Room Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Architecture; Buildings; Capital City; Religion; Jewish cemeteries--Tennessee--Nashville; Postcards--Tennessee--Nashville; Cemeteries--Tennessee--Nashville; Architectural elements--Tennessee--Nashville; Arches--Tennessee--Nashville; Domes--Tennessee--Nashville
Nashville (Tenn.)--History--Sources
